title: Web Development
subtitle: The Ultimate Full-Stack Web Development Masterclass
features: Learn Full-Stack Development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJs, NextJs, Node.js, ExpressJs, and MongoDB.)
Build Real-World Projects (hands-on projects guided by experts.)
Advanced Coding and Problem-Solving Workshops (Algorithms, Database Management & debugging techniques.)

courseOutcomes.title: Introduction to Web Development
description: Learn the fundamentals of web development and its importance.
Understand the structure of HTML and CSS.
Get introduced to JavaScript and its role in web applications.

courseOutcomes.title: Frontend Development
description: Master HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for building responsive websites.
Learn advanced JavaScript frameworks like React.js and Next.js.
Work on real-world projects to create dynamic user interfaces.

courseOutcomes.title: Backend Development
description: Understand server-side technologies with Node.js and Express.js.
Learn database management using MongoDB.
Integrate frontend and backend for full-stack application development.

title: Cyber Security
subtitle: Master Design with Hands-On Projects
features: Comprehensive Cyber Security Training (Real World Projects)
Hands-on Networking Labs (networking protocols, firewalls, routers, and servers)
Ethical Hacking and Security Workshops (ethical hacking, penetration testing & security auditing)

courseOutcomes.title: Introduction to Cyber Security
description: Understand the basics of cybersecurity and its importance.
Learn about common security threats and vulnerabilities.
Explore the roles of cybersecurity professionals.

courseOutcomes.title: Networking Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of networking and protocols.
Understand firewalls, routers, and server configurations.
Gain hands-on experience in setting up secure networks.

courseOutcomes.title: Ethical Hacking and Security
description: Learn ethical hacking techniques and tools.
Perform penetration testing and security auditing.
Develop skills in protecting systems from cyber threats.

title: UI/UX Design
subtitle: Master Design with Hands-On Projects
features: Hands-on Projects with Expert Mentors (Real World Projects)
Master Design Tools and Trends (Figma, Adobe XD etc.)
User-Centered Design Workshops (wireframing, prototyping, usability testing...)

courseOutcomes.title: Introduction to UI/UX
description: Learn the principles of user experience and user interface design.
Understand the importance of user-centered design.
Explore career opportunities in UI/UX design.

courseOutcomes.title: Design Tools
description: Master design tools like Figma and Adobe XD.
Learn techniques for wireframing and prototyping.
Understand how to create visually appealing designs.

courseOutcomes.title: Usability Testing
description: Conduct usability testing to evaluate user experience.
Identify and resolve design issues.
Implement feedback to improve designs.

title: Graphics Design
subtitle: Master Design with Hands-On Projects
features: Master Design Tools and Techniques (Photoshop, Illustrator)
Creative Projects and Portfolio Building (logos, posters etc.)
Workshops on Design Principles (color theory, typography, layout design...)

courseOutcomes.title: Introduction to Graphics Design
description: Learn the basics of graphic design and its importance.
Understand the principles of visual communication.
Explore tools and resources for beginners.

courseOutcomes.title: Mastering Tools
description: Gain proficiency in Photoshop and Illustrator.
Learn techniques for creating stunning graphics.
Work on real-world projects to build your skills.

courseOutcomes.title: Portfolio Building
description: Create a professional portfolio showcasing your work.
Learn tips for presenting designs effectively.
Explore freelancing and career opportunities in graphic design.
